metadata.description: A collection of skills for Agentic AI

plugins.name: java-spring
plugins.description: Spring Boot development patterns, best practices, and Spring Boot 4 features. Covers REST APIs, dependency injection, testing strategies, error handling with ProblemDetail, and modern Java patterns like records for DTOs.

plugins.name: spring-modulith
plugins.description: Expert guidance on building modular monoliths with Spring Modulith 2.0.2+. Covers module structure, verification, testing, and documentation generation.
